overview: Alexa Grace is failing photography class. She asks if there's any extra credit she can do and her teacher tells her some topless pics can't hurt! She agrees and soon her grades, and his cock, are on the rise!  Alina West wrote in an essay that she wants to be a pornstar. When Alina walks into class her teacher takes the opportunity to question her about her career goals and demanded she prove to him she has what it takes to be a star!  Kasey Warner - When her teacher takes a nap after class, Kasey decides to deliver a little lesson of her own! She starts sucking the teacher's cock, but once he gets up, this learning experience gets really wild!
title: Slutty Times At Innocent High 7
